name: Save Again
description:
The main character controlled by the player is one of the billions of citizens who live in “the perfect world”, until one day he accidentally discovered that they are human consciouses stuck in the world of code controlled by the central AI. The glorious and peaceful superficial of this world is actually just artificially built to keep human in captivity. He Entered the core data stream of AI by mistake; thus, a marvelous great escape began.

Every ten second the AI updates itself, Players can only avoid being assimilated back to the starting point by rushing to the next data stream storage point in ten seconds. The ultimate goal is to break through the data flow and return to the real world.

All of the music in our game came from https://freepd.com/electronic.php.
